title: 443. Fright Night Quilting Stories
description:
Happy Halloween! On today's episode, we're sharing some spooky quilting stories -- some of these are so frightful, you may need to hide under your coziest quilt while listening. We'll also share tips for what to do when your fabric bleeds, how to work with fabric panels, and some tips for hand quilting. And on this week's Getting Sewcial, we chat with Andrea of 3rd Story Workshop -- it's a conversation you don't want to miss!
For more resources from today's show, visit the show notes here.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: Fright Night Quilting Stories
itunes:author: American Patchwork & Quilting
itunes:subtitle: The entire staff shares their scariest sewing stories --  these spooky stories are relatable in the most cringe-worthy way.
